title: Feature Flags
subTitle: Feature Flags allow you to control the various enabled features in the application

sandbox.title: Sandbox Page
sandbox.description: A page that displays a list of all non-published forms

vault.title: Submission Vault
vault.description: A page that displays a list of submissions stored in the Vault for Forms enabled with that feature

unpublishedForms.title: Unpublished Forms
unpublishedForms.description: Allow the access to and completion of forms that do not have a published status

submitToReliabilityQueue.title: Submit to Reliability Queue
submitToReliabilityQueue.description: Submit form responses to the Reliability Queue. If disabled no form submissions will be submitted.  Usually used for testing.

reCaptcha.title: I am not a robot
reCaptcha.description: Enable protected by reCaptcha on forms before submission

formTimer.title: Form Timer
formTimer.description: Wait a specific amount of time before being allowed to submit the form

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.description: Allow users to register for an account

passwordReset.title: Allow Password Resets
passwordReset.description: Allow users to reset their passwords

supportForms.title: Support Forms
supportForms.description: Whether or not support forms are enabled

formBuilderDebug.title: Form Builder Debug
formBuilderDebug.description: Enable the form builder debug mode

formBuilderAddElementDialog.title: Form Builder Add Element Dialog
formBuilderAddElementDialog.description: Enable dialog when adding elements to the form builder

editableFilename.title: Form Builder Editable Filename
editableFilename.description: Updates header to include editable filename
